thread.title: PHOTOS: Taapsee Pannu Hot Photo Shoot For GQ India Magazine
thread.title_full: PHOTOS: Taapsee Pannu Hot Photo Shoot For GQ India Magazine

title: PHOTOS: Taapsee Pannu Hot Photo Shoot For GQ India Magazine
text:
Posted by: Pravallika Anjuri Updated: Monday, October 26, 2015, 16:17 [IST] 
Taapsee, who earned some brownie points for her performance in Ganga , is now on a look out for interesting scripts in Telugu, Hindi as well as Tamil. 
Though the actress was critically acclaimed for her acting in her previous release, it barely fetched her any projects. So, Taapsee appears to be totally vesting her time on brand endorsements and photo shoots, to grab the eye balls of film makers. 
As part of the trails, Taapsee Pannu was seen adorning the Galatta Magazine covers of October, early in the month. Now, the actress has released yet another sizzling photo shoot, which she had exclusively done for GQ India. 
Taapsee shared the tom-boyish side of her childhood and how guys always feared her, in an exclusive chat for the magazine cover story. 
She was styled by Desiree Fernandes for the sensuous photo shoot while hair and make-up were done by Elton Fernandez. The photo shoot reportedly happened at Taj Wellington Mews. 
The magazine, on their covers quoted that the actress will be unveiling her never seen before avatar with this issue. So, check out the below slides to have a look at the all new Taapsee Pannu, before you grab a copy to read about her unexposed side. PHOTOS: Taapsee Pannu GQ India Magazine Hot Photoshoot 1/7 
Tapsee Pannu blazer by Vero Moda, Brassiere by Hunkemöller and shorts by GAP. PHOTOS: Taapsee Pannu GQ India Magazine Hot Photoshoot 2/7 
Taapsee in dungarees by Gstar Raw, brassiere by Noir-Hunkemöller and shoes by Christian Louboutin. PHOTOS: Taapsee Pannu GQ India Magazine Hot Photoshoot 3/7 
Taapsee Pannu sweater by French Connection. PHOTOS: Taapsee Pannu GQ India Magazine Hot Photoshoot 4/7 
Taapsee Blazer by Etro, lingerie by Calvin Klein and shoes by Christian Louboutin. PHOTOS: Taapsee Pannu GQ India Magazine Hot Photoshoot 5/7 
Taapsee Pannu T-shirt by Brown Boy. 
PHOTOS: Taapsee Pannu GQ India Magazine Hot Photoshoot 6/7 
Taapsee Pannu sweater by Tommy Hilfiger and shoes by Jimmy Choo. You might like 7/7
